The title "Counter Strike" says it all. I don't think it needs to be reviewed at this point.
skvělá fps hra ale podle mě je blbé že na rank up potřebuješ mít win streak a protože mi win streak moc nejde tak jsem silver 1 a mám 100winů

I love this game, and all of the players are so pro, like SUPER PRO. I don't know why but these SUPER PRO players when they play they always look at the ground, maybe to increase their FPS. And when they shoot, they flick to their enemy's head instantly, almost like they have aimbot. I love the part that they can read where you are and shoot you through walls, maybe they used to play CS 1.6 when it was a thing. My favorite part was they called you trash because they're SUPER PRO GAMERS and it's kinda stranger they kept spamming in chat like "Never lose" or something like that.

Overall, great game. 69/10
